may be amended from time to time.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"I understand that although I am not an EPAM employee, as a Contractor when performing services for EPAM I am expected to adhere to the principles of expected conduct described in EPAM's Code and related underlying policies.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you have any questions or concerns regarding conduct under our Code,
